    • Method Detail

      • makeStoredSet

        public static ISet makeStoredSet(SetType type,
                 int maximumSize,
                 Solver solver)
        Make a stored set of integers in the range [0,maximumSize-1] Such a set is restored after a backtrack
        Parameters:
        type - of set data structure
        maximumSize - of the set (maximum value -1)
        solver - solver providing the backtracking environment
        Returns:
        a new set which can be restored during search, after some backtracks

      • makeSet

        public static ISet makeSet(SetType type,
           int maximumSize)
        Make a set of integers in the range [0,maximumSize-1]
        Parameters:
        type - of set data structure
        maximumSize - of the set (maximum value -1)
        Returns:
        a new set

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • makeFullSet

        public static ISet makeFullSet(int n)
        Creates a set that will ALWAYS contain all values from 0 to n-1
        Parameters:
        n - size of the set
        Returns:
        a new set that must always be full

      • makeSwap

        public static ISet makeSwap(int n,
            boolean hash)
        Creates a set based on swaps Optimal complexity
        Parameters:
        n - maximal size of the set
        hash - lighter in memory by slower (false is recommended)
        Returns:
        a new set
